 CxList AllMethodInvoke = Find_Methods();
CxList superFinalize = All.FindByFathers(All.FindByType(typeof(BaseRef)).GetFathers()).FindByShortName("finalize");

result = AllMethodInvoke.FindByShortName("finalize") - superFinalize;
